* Whip advises Thomas that he needs to do something big to wow the crowd and make headlines
* The men's fashion show begins, but the reaction is underwhelming compared to Hope's line
* As the finale approaches, Thomas hints at a mysterious plan to Brooke and asks her to go along with it
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 8 bullet points:

<summary>
• Ridge is concerned about Thomas's whereabouts and escalating behavior regarding Hope
• Hope is distraught, believing she killed Thomas by accidentally pushing him into a vat of hydrofluoric acid
• Brooke tries to reassure Hope that it was self-defense since Thomas was aggressively coming onto her
• Brooke suggests keeping quiet about the incident since the acid and vat were disposed of, leaving no evidence
• Hope insists on telling the truth about what happened despite the consequences
• Ridge laments to Steffy about Thomas's obsession with Hope and giving her joint custody of Douglas
• Hope apologizes to Thomas, regretting the accident and fearing the repercussions on her life and family
• In a shocking twist, Thomas appears to Hope, revealing that he is actually alive
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 3 bullet points:

<summary>
• Stephanie is dying and has an emotional conversation with Brooke, giving Brooke her ring and acknowledging their complex relationship over the years.
• Various characters, including Stephanie's family members, reflect on Stephanie's impact on their lives and say goodbye to her in a video tribute.
• Katie struggles with postpartum depression but with Taylor's help, she overcomes her fear and holds her baby son Will again.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 6 bullet points:

<summary>
* Stephanie was shot and is in the hospital recovering from surgery. She claims Donna shot her.
* Eric questions Donna about the shooting. Donna denies shooting Stephanie and says Stephanie is lying or confused.
* Ridge believes Stephanie's accusation that a Logan family member shot her, while Brooke defends her family.
* Pam, Stephanie's sister, arrives at Eric's house to take care of him while Stephanie is in the hospital.
* Donna confronts Stephanie in the hospital, telling her to stop accusing Donna of the shooting.
* Donna suggests Stephanie may have staged the shooting herself, and warns that the real shooter is still out there.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 8 bullet points:

<summary>
• Phoebe returns home from touring with Constantine and reunites with her mother Taylor
• Phoebe is upset with Taylor for having dated Rick, Phoebe's ex-boyfriend, while Phoebe was away
• Ridge visits Phoebe at Taylor's house and Phoebe agrees to sing a song at Ridge and Brooke's rehearsal dinner
• Brooke tries to convince Rick to attend her wedding to Ridge and be supportive
• Rick adamantly refuses at first, saying he will never support Brooke's relationship with Ridge
• Taylor agrees to move on from Ridge if he promises to still spend time with her and the kids as a family sometimes
• Brooke tells Rick she needs him at the wedding and that Ridge is planning a special beach ceremony
• Rick relents and agrees to attend the wedding to support his mother Brooke
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 6 bullet points:

<summary>
• Brooke wants to include Jack, her biological son with Nick who is being raised by Nick and Taylor, in her life with Ridge and their children, but Ridge is against the idea.
• Ridge confided in Ashley about the situation with Jack, which upset Brooke. 
• Nick suggested inviting Brooke and Ridge to Jack's christening, but Taylor was strongly opposed to Brooke being involved in their lives.
• Ridge called Taylor and agreed they should keep their families separate for now, hoping Brooke would accept this.
• Brooke secretly met with Nick and said she can no longer see Jack, as difficult as it is, in order to protect her future with Ridge.
• Brooke was heartbroken but felt she had to let Jack go, and Nick said he knows she will always love Jack even if Jack doesn't know who she is.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 10 bullet points:

<summary>
• Thorne kisses Brooke and suggests they give their relationship another try
• Ridge is impressed by R.J.'s design talent and offers to mentor him
• Ridge is unhappy that Thorne is back and thinks he is trying to cause trouble between Ridge and Brooke
• Quinn and Ivy discuss engagement ring options for Brooke, with Quinn favoring an emerald cut
• Maya and Nicole discuss Brooke and Thorne's close interaction, wondering if something is going on between them
• Thorne criticizes Ridge's past behavior and treatment of Brooke, saying she deserves better
• Brooke recounts seeing Ridge and Quinn kiss in Australia before Brooke and Ridge's planned wedding
• Thorne pushes Brooke to stop making excuses for Ridge and to give herself a chance at true happiness
• Maya and Nicole worry what a rivalry between Ridge and Thorne over Brooke could do to the family
• Thorne implores Brooke not to marry Ridge and proposes that she marry him instead
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 4 bullet points:

<summary>
* Nicole is desperate to adopt Mia's baby and pass it off as her own with E.J., but Brady refuses to help her deceive E.J. and Mia
* John has decided to undergo hypnosis to try to regain his memories, despite Marlena's concerns about his growing closeness with his therapist Dr. Charlotte Taylor
* At Lucas and Chloe's engagement party, Daniel confronts Chloe and urges her not to marry Lucas when she doesn't truly love him
* Chelsea debates whether to bring Max as her date to the engagement party to avoid feeling alone seeing the other happy couples there
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 5 bullet points:

<summary>
* Adrienne tells Jennifer that she saw Abigail and EJ together looking at a book intently. Jennifer confronts Abigail about what is going on between her and EJ.
* Daniel discovers his computer files are missing and suspects a doctor he was talking to earlier. He tries to get backup files from a DNA lab.
* Julie asks Kate if she knows why Nick left town and is being elusive. Kate denies knowing anything.
* EJ tells Sami he is tired of always cleaning up messes related to her and putting aside things important to him. Sami asks what he wants.
* Eric goes to Daniel's apartment and finds Nicole unconscious on the floor with an unknown man.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 7 bullet points:

<summary>
* Melanie is upset that her father is leaving town for an unknown amount of time to get his life together after losing his ability to work
* Kate wants Gabi and Chad to be the fresh new faces to model for Countess Wilhelmina's youth campaign
* Chad tries to comfort a distraught Melanie and wants to be there for her, but Melanie resists out of loyalty to Abigail
* Sami is secretly working as a double agent, pretending to work for Kate at Countess Wilhelmina while really helping Madison at Mad World to sabotage Kate's plans
* Bo and Hope set up a ruse to get Stefano to come to the bank so they can confront him about the safe deposit box he shares with Alice Grayson
* Victor tells Daniel there is something he needs to know about Maggie being his mother
* Madison admits to Brady that she has been keeping a secret from him
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 3 bullet points:

<summary>
• Sami is worried that her horoscope predicting a man from her past will ruin her wedding to Lucas will come true when Brandon shows up in Salem, so she confesses secrets to an unconscious Brandon, unaware that Eugenia drugged them both to make it look like they slept together
• Belle struggles with whether to tell Philip, who has shipped out with the Marines, that she is still in love with Shawn, while Jan tries to guilt Belle into staying with Philip so she can keep Shawn for herself
• John is going through painful drug withdrawal, which Kate is helping him hide from everyone, and he hallucinates that Kate is Marlena, who is presumed dead
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 5 bullet points:

<summary>
• EJ and Sami argue over the phone about Sami being away on a business trip and EJ wanting her to come home to deal with the situation with Nick

</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 6 bullet points:

<summary>

• Melanie feels unwell before the wedding after Vivian puts a comb in her hair
• Chloe reveals to Daniel that she is pregnant with his baby
• Carly confronts Vivian, vowing to stop her plan and save Melanie even if it means killing Vivian
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 4 bullet points:

<summary>
• Max and Abby reconnect while working together at the garage, and Abby admits she used to have a crush on Max

• Hope tries to convince Bo to forgive Chelsea and not turn his back on her, saying she is part of the family

Here is a summary of the text in 5 bullet points:

<summary>
• Abe catches Lexie and Tek in a compromising position in Tek's car, but his poor night vision prevents him from realizing what is happening.

• At Shawn and Mimi's pre-wedding parties, Philip gives a heartfelt speech about his love for Belle and their daughter Claire, while Mimi struggles with whether to reveal to Shawn that he is actually Claire's father.
• Victor decides not to tell Shawn the truth about being Claire's father after Kate convinces him it would cause too much pain for everyone involved.
• Mimi writes Shawn a letter revealing the truth and believes it will end their relationship, while Belle arranges to meet Shawn on the roof to discuss her feelings.

Here is a summary of the text in 3 bullet points:

<summary>

• Kate confesses to Roman about her past as a prostitute, worried it will change how he feels about her. Meanwhile, Belle and Shawn share playful moments together at an arcade, resolving to stay happy and not fall into patterns of fighting.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 2 bullet points:

<summary>
* Ava is holding Steve, Kayla, Bo, and Hope hostage. Hope is unconscious after being shot and needs medical attention. Ava reveals she plans to keep Kayla's baby as her own as payback for Steve ruining her life.
* Chelsea is in the hospital after losing consciousness. The doctors are concerned about complications from her recent surgery but have not revealed the test results yet. Kate and Nick wait anxiously for news on Chelsea's condition.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 5 bullet points:

<summary>
• Theo and Ciara are found safe after running away, and are reunited with their families
• Rafe explains to Bo how he found the kids before the police did, raising Bo's suspicions

</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 10 bullet points:

<summary>

• Belle and Mimi worry about Shawn, Rex, Brady and Lucas who left to rescue Philip

• Hope is upset that Bo disappeared again with Billie

• Shawn, Rex, Brady and Lucas parachute out of a plane to rescue Philip

Here is a summary of the text in 8 bullet points:

<summary>
* Paul tells Sonny that Deimos chartered a plane to Manitoba, Canada, not Quebec, likely to go after Brady and Nicole
* Steve and Kayla have dinner with their sons Joey and Tripp, but Tripp leaves upset, unable to forgive Steve for killing his mother Ava
* Brady and Nicole enjoy a romantic evening together in Canada with the kids asleep

Here is a summary of the text in 8 bullet points:

<summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 8 bullet points:

<summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 9 bullet points:

<summary>

* Kate informs Sonny that Gabi and Nick have a court hearing next week for custody of Arianna
* Will realizes Nick is blackmailing Abigail with a secret to get her to go along with his plans
* Nick is shot in Horton Square and Julie screams for help

Here is a summary of the text in 9 bullet points:

<summary>

• Jan is holding Shawn captive and tries to get him to eat breakfast and be intimate with her
• Nicole asks Brady who is calling for her, and he says it's her "new best friend"

• John, Belle, and others share memories of Marlena at the funeral service
• As Sami says goodbye to Marlena alone, she hears Marlena's voice calling to her from the casket
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 5 bullet points:

<summary>

• Chloe realizes Lucas must have been spying on her at the pier; separately, Philip confronts his associate Paul about burning down the warehouse
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 7 bullet points:

<summary>

* Daniel and Chloe's wedding is interrupted again, this time by Carly who has something to say
* Various other Salem residents deal with family matters and relationships
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 7 bullet points:

<summary>
* Hope and Aiden are about to get married, but Hope stops the wedding officiated by André, saying she can't marry Aiden like this
* Aiden takes his son Chase to a psychiatric hospital as part of a deal to avoid a trial for Chase raping Ciara
* Ciara is interested in pursuing a career in psychology and volunteers at the psychiatric hospital where Abigail is staying
* Abigail worries she may have started the fire and could be sent to a state mental institution
* Hope decides to go away with Aiden for a few days to figure things out, despite Rafe's reservations
* Aiden is secretly working with André on some unknown plan that is now in motion
* A criminal named Monahan shows up at the police station to confess to killing Stefano DiMera

Here is a summary of the text in 9 bullet points:

<summary>
* Abe agrees to officiate Sami and EJ's wedding ceremony
* Paige tells Jennifer about her mother Eve and they plan to have dinner together
* JJ meets Paige's mother Eve but doesn't tell her his full name
* Jordan is worried that someone from her past will find her and Ben in Salem
* Kate urges Jordan not to give up on Rafe, who is struggling after Gabi's imprisonment
