* Sami thanks Abigail for her help with the wedding and asks her to do a reading at the ceremony
* Sami and Kate discuss their secret plan for revenge against EJ and Abigail
* Eve is surprised to learn that Paige's boyfriend JJ is a Deveraux
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 8 bullet points:

<summary>
• Kate expresses condolences to Victor about Caroline's death and the loss of his chance to be with her. They discuss Nicole taking a job at DiMera.
• Xander confronts Ted, who figured out that Nicole is Xander's partner. Ted tries to bargain for his life by offering Xander a necklace and his services as DA.
• Sami argues with Nicole, blaming her for unfairly accusing Eric for Holly's death. Sami is glad Eric is moving on from Nicole, possibly with Sarah.
• Rex announces to Eric that he and Sarah are getting married immediately and asks Eric to officiate. Sarah agrees to the impromptu wedding.
• Brady questions Nicole about her job at DiMera. Nicole makes a pass at Brady but he refuses out of respect for Eric. Nicole acts suspiciously about Ted's "good news".
• Sami insists Nicole is hiding something more than just a scar. Kate sneaks into Nicole's room and finds evidence that Nicole has a secret.
• Hope questions Xander about his suspicious behavior. Earlier, Xander spared Ted's life, taking the necklace he planned to give Hope.
• As Rex and Sarah's wedding is about to begin, Eric struggles with having to marry them. He had wanted to tell Sarah something before the ceremony.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 7 bullet points:

<summary>
* Hope asks Marlena to send Ben back to the mental hospital, but Marlena refuses, believing Ben is mentally fit and did not set the fire that almost killed Ciara.
* Ben visits Ciara and Tripp to tell them he was hypnotized by Marlena and now remembers he definitely did not set the fire. Tripp angrily tells Ben to leave.
* Lani receives a death certificate for her and Eli's son David, who was stillborn. She and Eli share an emotional moment grieving their loss.
* JJ sees Chad and Gabi in a close moment and confronts them, but Chad explains he was just confiding in Gabi as a friend about his struggles with Abigail's pregnancy.
* Abigail tells Stefan she is going to raise the baby with Chad and doesn't want Stefan involved until after the birth. Stefan says he will respect her wishes but be there for her if needed.
* Chad confides in Marlena that he is having a hard time accepting Abigail's pregnancy and worries that Abigail may have real feelings for Stefan. Marlena encourages Chad that he can be a good father to the baby.
* Hope summons Ben to the police station for an unknown reason.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 7 bullet points:

<summary>
• At Marlena and John's wedding, Sami interrupts the ceremony claiming someone is trying to kill Marlena
• Will leaves the wedding and has an emotional conversation with Sonny, remembering their own wedding and his love for Sonny
• Sami attacks Susan, but it's revealed that "Susan" is actually Kristen DiMera in disguise
• Kristen holds everyone at gunpoint, seeking revenge on Marlena for pushing her out of a window
• Brady tries to talk Kristen down by appealing to her desire to be loved and have a family
• Kristen forces Sami to take the gun, claiming she will take Sami to see EJ, who Kristen says is still alive, if Sami shoots John
• Eric pleads with Sami not to pull the trigger as Kristen pressures her to do it so she can see EJ again
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 10 bullet points:

<summary>
• JJ admits to his mother Jennifer that he told Paige he is working undercover for the DEA to take down drug dealer Kyle
• Eve confronts Kyle, telling him that JJ is working with the cops and provides a recording of JJ as proof
• Chad and Serena flirt and kiss while drinking, though a drunk Serena eventually puts a stop to it
• Abigail has a fantasy of telling Chad that he is the father of her baby and that she loves him
• Caroline agrees to help with Salem's bicentennial celebration after some convincing
• Paul and Will argue, blaming each other for Will's marriage to Sonny falling apart
• Aiden thanks Hope for including him and his son Chase in her life; he hints at a surprise contribution he is making to the bicentennial celebration
• In a phone call, Aiden says he has been tasked with making Hope his and that she is over her ex Bo
• Ben expresses his excitement to Abigail about starting a family together
• Eve flirts with a moody Justin at a bar, trying to cheer him up
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 10 bullet points:

<summary>
* Will's grandmother Kate is in surgery after being shot, and his father is catching the first plane to Salem.
* Jack and Jennifer suspect Eve destroyed Dr. Rolf's work on the memory serum out of revenge.
* Vivian, who is alive, plans to ensure Kate doesn't survive so she can't reveal that Vivian shot and buried her.
* Brady goes to see Kristen despite knowing he shouldn't, and Kristen tries to seduce him.
* Nicole tells Xander that Eric already informed her about his past relationship with Sarah.
* Xander hints to Nicole that there may be more to Eric and Sarah's relationship than she knows.
* Sarah struggles to tell Eric something important before he reunites with Nicole.
* Eve impresses Vivian with her determination to get revenge on Jack and offers to help at DiMera Enterprises.
* Brady admits to Kristen that he is drawn to her but refuses to let her destroy him again.
* Xander reveals to Sarah that he knows she is pregnant.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 9 bullet points:

<summary>
• Marlena helps treat JJ, who was shot by Orpheus and has a collapsed lung
• Gabi and Chad comfort each other as they worry about JJ's condition
• Steve and John capture Orpheus and bring him into custody
• Adrienne and Justin have an emotional discussion about their past and current relationship
• Anne shows up at the DiMera mansion looking for a place to stay and opens up to Lucas about her mother
• Orpheus takes Marlena hostage at the police station and injects himself with a lethal dose of sedative
• Jennifer and Adrienne comfort each other as they wait for news on JJ's condition after surgery
• Gabi stays by JJ's side in the hospital, promising to never take him for granted again
• John rescues Marlena as Orpheus dies from the sedative overdose, bringing an end to the crisis
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 10 bullet points:

<summary>
* Gabi and Eli share a kiss at the police station, which Rafe disapproves of
* Eve reveals to Victor and Brady that Deimos left her controlling interest in Basic Black before he died
* Chad and Abigail discuss her new job as head of PR at DiMera while in bed together
* Kate offers to buy Gabi's company Gabi Chic and have Gabi work for her at DiMera
* Eric tells Jennifer he is grateful for her friendship and support as he tries to move on from Nicole
* Victor demotes Brady from CEO of Titan and tells him to get rid of Eve in order to be reconsidered for the position
* Brady, struggling with alcohol again, vows to ensure Eve is out of their lives for good
* Eli and Rafe argue about their partnership dynamic and Rafe's ego after not being made police commissioner
* Gabi learns Abigail will be working at DiMera as head of PR when she tells Chad and Abigail about Kate's job offer
* Brady calls Rafe and Eli and claims Eve is the one who killed Deimos
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 9 bullet points:

<summary>
• Abe forgives Sheila for missing work and she keeps her job as his assistant
• Valerie tells Abe she was offered a job as Chief of Staff at her old hospital in Washington D.C. and wants him to consider moving there with her, but Abe refuses
• Will tells Marlena he broke up with Paul and is moving out so he can be with Sonny, but Sonny has left town
• Paul tells John and Brady he is moving back to San Francisco for an experimental program that could help him walk again
• Claire is glad Ben told Ciara the truth about Tripp framing him for the fire, hoping it will lead to Ciara breaking up with Tripp
• Ciara confronts Tripp about framing Ben and lying to her; Tripp accuses her of having feelings for Ben
• Tripp breaks up with Ciara
• Paul says an emotional goodbye to John and Brady before leaving Salem with his physical therapist Luke
• A devastated Ciara tells Ben that she and Tripp broke up
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 2 bullet points:

<summary>
• Abigail secretly returns to Salem but decides not to reveal herself to Chad after seeing him with Gabi, believing he has moved on; André tries to convince Abigail to reclaim her life for her son Thomas's sake
• Sonny locks his parents and Lucas in a room together to sort out their feelings; Paul and Steve investigate a mysterious shipment for Eduardo's family business and discover it contains counterfeit designer handbags
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 6 bullet points:

<summary>
• Sami and Rafe celebrate New Year's Eve together and discuss their hopes for the future, but Sami receives a mysterious text from EJ asking to meet without telling Rafe.
• Melanie and Philip plan to elope to Las Vegas, which upsets Nathan who still has feelings for Melanie. Nathan and Philip get into a physical altercation.
• Carly confesses to Daniel that she killed Lawrence, and Vivian is plotting revenge against Carly for Lawrence's death.
• Hope and Justin search Vivian's room for documents containing Carly's secret while Vivian and Victor are away.
• Daniel and Chloe share a romantic New Year's Eve moment, continuing their tradition from the previous year.
• Maggie is disappointed that Mickey can't make it home for New Year's, but Julie convinces her to still go out and celebrate.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 3 bullet points:

<summary>
• Luke is recovering in the hospital and receives a visit from his friend Ernesto, as well as his family. He insists he will follow the doctors' orders but is later caught by Tracy with contraband cigars.
• Alexis and Diane are both nominated for Litigator of the Year. Alexis asks her daughter to babysit while she attends the awards dinner. Diane stresses about finding the perfect dress.
• Sonny is arrested for assault in New York. Jason and Spinelli try to locate him. Meanwhile, Jerry orders a hit on Stan, one of Sonny's men. Epiphany talks to Stan on the phone before the line goes dead after a crash.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 4 bullet points:

<summary>
• Sonny shot Dominic, not realizing Dominic is actually his son Dante with Olivia. Dante is rushed to the hospital in critical condition with a bullet lodged near his spine.
• At Josslyn's christening party, people wonder where Sonny and Dominic are. Jax hopes his secret plan to have Sonny arrested has worked so Josslyn can have a safer life.
• At the hospital, Sonny calls in Robin and Patrick to help with Dante's surgery. Olivia tells an unconscious Dante how proud she is of him and to keep fighting.
• The christening party continues with opening gifts. Morgan plays a mysterious unmarked DVD that shows a man named Franco talking about feeling nothing and mimicking ordinary people.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 8 bullet points:

<summary>
• Claudia Zacchara tries to make a deal with Jason to release her brother Johnny in exchange for taking down Trevor Lansing, but Sonny refuses while his son Michael is still missing
• Nikolas has visions of Emily that lead him to remember Diego Alcazar murdered her at the Halloween ball
• Sam is being held captive by Diego, the text message killer, who plans to kill her as revenge against Jason and Sonny
• Lulu is torn between her feelings for Johnny and Logan, who is in a coma; Lucky advises her to take her time sorting out her emotions
• Epiphany joins a support group for women with heart disease to share her story and help others
• Sonny holds Johnny captive in an abandoned psychiatric hospital to force Trevor to give up information on Michael's whereabouts
• Maxie and Spinelli try to decipher a clue left behind by Coop that could lead them to the identity of the text message killer
• Patrick wants to discuss the baby with Robin now that she is back in town
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 10 bullet points:

<summary>
• Johnny tries to break into Bernie Abrams' office wearing a Clinton mask and shoots at Lucky before escaping
• Sonny meets with Dante and Claire Walsh at the police station; Dante is determined to testify against Sonny
• Jason asks Spinelli to analyze a disturbing photo of Franco that showed up in Josslyn's christening album
• Alexis agrees to help Diane defend Sonny but is unhappy about having to share Diane's office during renovations
• Sonny tells Luke that Dante, Lulu and Ethan are all under his protection
• Elizabeth decides she wants to raise her children on her own without help from Lucky or Nikolas
• Spinelli enlists Maxie's help in investigating a possible serial killer at the Metro Court hotel
• Lucky threatens to arrest Ethan for being in the U.S. illegally in order to get him away from Johnny and the mob
• Nikolas questions why Elizabeth accepted Jason's help with Jake but won't accept his help
• Dante confronts Michael about what really happened to Claudia but Sonny intervenes and kicks Dante out
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 4 bullet points:

<summary>
• Todd Manning tries to shoot Sonny Corinthos, blaming him for the deaths of his granddaughter Hope and her father Cole in a car accident, but is stopped by his daughter Starr and arrested by John McBain.
• Maxie feels guilty about her cousin Robin's death in an explosion at the hospital lab and talks to psychiatrist Dr. Ewen about her grief.
• Anthony Zacchara wants his son Johnny to sleep with Sonny's girlfriend Kate Howard to get revenge on Sonny, but Johnny refuses. Kate appears to have a split personality named Connie.
• Sonny and John, who previously worked together at the FBI, have a tense confrontation about Sonny's possible involvement in the car accident that killed Cole and Hope.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 2 bullet points:

<summary>
* Sonny and Carly are grieving over Morgan's death at his grave, while Olivia Jerome, revealed to be alive, has kidnapped Alexis to get revenge on Julian for killing her love Duke.
* A bomb planted by Olivia goes off at the hospital, but Jason and Curtis manage to minimize the damage, and afterwards Sonny vows to find Olivia and make her pay for killing Morgan.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 3 bullet points:

<summary>
* Michael confronts Brandon for attempting to rape Abby and threatens him, while Abby tries to convince Michael not to retaliate as it could send him back to prison. Abby decides to drop the charges against Brandon out of fear it will negatively impact Michael.
* Luke blames himself for accidentally hitting and killing Jake with his car after having a few drinks. Sonny tries to console Luke that it was an accident that could have happened to anyone. Elizabeth also blames herself for not watching Jake closely enough.
* Theo's wife Suzanne surprises him by revealing she has been hiding their grandson from him. She wants to raise the boy together without Brenda ever knowing her son is alive in order to rebuild their relationship.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 2 bullet points:

<summary>
* The text contains several scenes involving different characters discussing their relationships and problems, including: Jason and Sam considering having a baby despite Jason's grief over losing his son Jake; Sonny and Brenda having marital issues as Brenda adjusts to being a mother to her son Alec; and Carly fighting with Jax for custody of their daughter Josslyn while also dealing with the threat of Franco.
* In a separate storyline, Lisa has trapped Robin in the basement with a gas leak, hoping to frame Patrick for Robin's murder as revenge for Patrick ending their affair and going back to Robin.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 3 bullet points:

<summary>
* Lucas wakes up in the hospital after being attacked by an unknown assailant in a doctor's coat, but he is unable to identify the attacker
* Nathan confesses to Maxie that years ago, he drunkenly shot his ex-wife Claudette's lover after finding them in bed together, putting a strain on his relationship with Maxie
* Jason and Sam deduce that Nikolas likely staged his own death to frame Hayden and escape legal trouble, but now there is a warrant out for Jason's arrest for Nikolas' murder
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 8 bullet points:

<summary>
* Nikolas breaks up with Rebecca because she reminds him too much of Emily
* Carly wants to take Michael to physical therapy but he insists on going alone
* Andrea Floyd tries to convince Patrick to settle the malpractice suit out of court to avoid a scandal
* Elizabeth thinks Rebecca is cheating on Nikolas with Ethan
* Michael goes to a bar and plays pool with Johnny Zacchara
* Olivia is worried Sonny will retaliate against Johnny for being involved with her
* Claudia asks Johnny to let Jason be ambushed and killed when they go meet with some disloyal lieutenants
* Michael gets in a confrontation with his sister Kristina's boyfriend Kiefer at the bar
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 2 bullet points:

<summary>
• Georgie survives emergency surgery after a fall, while Maxie's condition deteriorates as she rejects B.J.'s transplanted heart. Maxie says her goodbyes to her family as she nears death.
• Sonny questions whether he can trust Ric and Reese after Reese's ex-husband Evan is killed in a confrontation with Ric. Reese admits she knew Carly in high school but changed her identity after a car accident.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 6 bullet points:

<summary>
* Patrick and Robin take care of Elizabeth's baby Jake, with Patrick struggling at first but eventually succeeding in changing diapers and feeding him
* Sonny and Kate discuss getting a pre-nup before their wedding, with Kate wanting to protect her assets in case Sonny gets in legal trouble from his past
* Carly feels nauseous and Jax thinks she may be pregnant, but Carly denies it, not wanting to be happy about a baby while Michael is comatose
* A feverish Spinelli rants to Jason that Sonny will force Jason to kill him as punishment for what happened to Michael
* Lulu confronts Maxie about her inappropriate comments regarding Lulu's mother Laura's mental illness
* Johnny gets arrested after a public confrontation with Logan, with Scott wanting to press assault charges
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 4 bullet points:

<summary>
• Lulu reveals to Nikolas and Laura that Stavros had Nikolas shot as punishment for Lulu refusing to consummate their forced marriage. Lulu also shares that she is having a baby girl.
• Alexis gives Shawn an ultimatum to quit working for Sonny if he wants to continue their relationship. Shawn agrees to her terms.
• Carly reluctantly allows Morgan to stay with Ava and Franco after they blackmail her over the shooting. Franco later suspects Ava was behind one of the shootings.
• Luke leaves Tracy a note saying he must go on his mission alone to protect her. Tracy discovers the note after gathering cash to go with him.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 8 bullet points:

<summary>
• Patrick is exposed to HIV while operating on an AIDS patient and must take anti-retroviral drugs and be tested
• Sonny has an argument with Emily after a difficult therapy session with Dr. Lainey Winters about his childhood abuse
• Nikolas enjoys spending time with Emily and his son John, while the nanny Colleen seems jealous of Emily's presence
• Sam is having a terrible day and gets stuck in an elevator with Jason, who offers to help her study for her GED test
• Carly confronts Sonny about his anger towards his mother Adela for not protecting him from his abusive stepfather
• Lucky is upset to learn he may not have been the one to kill Manny Ruiz, and Elizabeth finds pills he has been taking
• Sam admits to Jason that she misses their relationship, and he reveals he never stopped loving her
• Sonny thanks Carly for helping him gain clarity about his childhood and tells her she doesn't have to leave
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 10 bullet points:

<summary>
• Sam leaves a message for Dr. Finn asking him to call back with her test results, which will affect decisions she has to make.
• Kevin is recovering in the hospital after being shot. He doesn't remember what he said to Laura on the plane ride back.
• Ava refuses to help Holt break Julian out of prison, but implies she wouldn't oppose if someone else did it.
• Julian dreams that Alexis visits him in jail and says she still wants to be his wife. In reality, Alexis wants Julian to speak to the Bar Association on her behalf to help her avoid being disbarred.
• Kristina apologizes to Aaron for being dishonest about her feelings for her professor Parker. Aaron is hurt but tries to be understanding.
• Julian agrees to help Alexis only if she helps him go free, which she refuses. A guard helps Julian escape from prison.
• Sam tells Elizabeth she is pregnant. She is waiting on test results to see if she has malaria, which could harm the baby.
• Ava tells Laura that Nikolas died a hero, sacrificing himself to save Ava. This gives Laura some comfort.
• Jordan gives André a key to her place as a compromise for the pace of their relationship.
• Kristina realizes her mom Alexis may have contacted Parker behind her back based on something Alexis said.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 10 bullet points:

<summary>
• Alexis has a health scare that frightens her daughter Kristina, and Sonny comforts them both
• Lucky admits to Nikolas and Emily that Elizabeth caught him cheating on her with Maxie
• Elizabeth shows up at Jason's place upset, revealing Lucky's affair and that she has nowhere else to go
• Jason tells Elizabeth that Sam slept with Ric
• Sam confronts Ric, saying she will tell Jason the truth about their encounter
• Lulu learns about Lucky's drug addiction and affair, and asks Nikolas to make sure he is okay
• Sonny and Alexis discuss the difficulties in their respective marriages
• Ric goes to Sonny, wanting him to stop Jason from coming after him for sleeping with Sam
• Elizabeth and Jason grow closer, but she says they can only have one night together due to his dangerous lifestyle
• Elizabeth decides to stay the night with Jason since she has nowhere else to go
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 10 bullet points:

<summary>
• TJ calls Molly asking for help with a problem at Kelly's
• Sonny is about to kill AJ but Michael stops him, saying he won't be his son anymore if he does it
• It's Sonny and Carly's wedding day but Carly has some concerns, including about Morgan
• Morgan shows up drunk at Sonny's, blaming Sonny for his problems and breakup with Kiki
• Michael debates going to the wedding to support Morgan even though he's upset with Sonny for killing AJ
• Molly helps TJ fix a wedding cake he messed up that was for Sonny and Carly's wedding
• Spencer wants Nikolas and Hayden to get back together like he wants to with Emma
• Anna returns and offers to help Sam get evidence that Nikolas rigged the mayoral election
• Sonny convinces Morgan to see a doctor about possibly being bipolar
• Someone grabs TJ as he's admiring the fixed wedding cake
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 4 bullet points:

<summary>
* Nikolas denies knowing Jake's true identity to Hayden, who suspects they were co-conspirators
* Anna confronts Sloane about not pressuring Nikolas to give up ELQ as she requested, and Sloane reveals he has been working for Nikolas
* Sonny is shot while rescuing TJ from his kidnappers; Jason arrives on the scene and tries to keep Sonny alive until the ambulance arrives
* As Carly prepares for the wedding, she is unaware that Sonny has been critically injured and may not survive
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 6 bullet points:

<summary>
• Sam and Silas discuss his past relationship with Ava and the possibility of a future between them once Danny recovers from his transplant.
• Britt gives birth to a baby boy at Wyndemere with Sabrina's help, but the baby has fluid in his lungs and needs to be rushed to the hospital.
• Franco is exonerated of all charges due to his brain tumor and kicks Ava out of the Quartermaine mansion, claiming to have feelings for Carly.
• Morgan apologizes to Sonny, believing Connie's death was his fault for asking Sonny to keep the secret about Kiki not being a Quartermaine.
• Michael accepts Kiki as part of the family and Morgan's wife, despite the lies and deception surrounding her paternity.
• Sonny is in a dark place emotionally, not wanting to feel better after Connie's death, despite his family's support and concern.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 4 bullet points:

<summary>
• Doctors work to find an antidote to a deadly pathogen released in Port Charles, but only have enough for one dose, which Edward Quartermaine insists goes to Patrick's daughter Emma
• Jerry Jacks, responsible for the pathogen, tries to escape with Alexis as a hostage but is confronted by his brother Jax and shot by Sonny
• John McBain attempts to defuse a bomb Jerry attached to the case holding the antidote while Dante and Lulu take cover
• Tracy reflects on her father Edward's long, full life as he nears the end, hoping he will be reunited with his beloved wife Lila
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 7 bullet points:

<summary>
* Tracy's son Dillon's movie production is halted due to a permit issue, but Tracy's ex-husband Paul, who knows the mayor, gets the order retracted.
* Ava is worried that the recording proving she killed Connie has been stolen and she could be recharged with the murder. She demands Scott recover the flash drive.
* Sonny remembers Morgan saying he is going to kill Julian Jerome for shooting Sonny. Michael and Carly are worried and Michael goes to find Morgan.
* TJ overhears Alexis telling Julian about a secluded cabin she rented for him to hide out in. Morgan pressures TJ to tell him where Julian is.
* Patrick celebrates his birthday with Sam, Emma, Danny, and Anna. He tells Sam he wants to marry her.
* Kristina can't reach Alexis and is worried Morgan will find her with Julian and Alexis will get caught in the crossfire.
* Morgan confronts Julian and Alexis with a gun at the cabin, telling Julian he can't run.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 8 bullet points:

<summary>
* Sonny and Kate's wedding is about to start, but there are several interruptions and objections before the vows can begin
* Elizabeth reveals to Jason that she lied about the DNA test results and that Sam's baby is actually alive and being raised by Téa Delgado
* Kristina gets into a fight with Trey and is then kidnapped by Trey's father Joe Scully Jr., who plans to kill her as revenge against Sonny
* Olivia tries to object at the wedding, believing Kate is actually her alternate personality Connie, but is stopped
* Just as the wedding is finally about to proceed, Kate herself objects, revealing that she is already married
* Sam and John McBain share a moment of connection but decide not to act on their feelings
* Elizabeth confesses her lies and manipulations to Sam, admitting that Jason chose Sam over her
* Jason tells John McBain that Sam's baby is alive, and they realize they need to carefully handle the situation with Téa
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 2 bullet points:

<summary>
* Claudia plans to marry Sonny to strengthen the Zacchara organization, despite Johnny's objections, while Sonny agrees to the marriage in order to find out who shot Kate.
* Elizabeth, Sam, and the boys arrive at a remote cabin, but discover that Russian mobsters have followed them there and cut the phone lines, leaving them isolated and in danger.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 8 bullet points:

<summary>
• Jason goes to confront Franco at his studio to find out what he knows about Michael killing Claudia
• Carly wants to confess to the police that Michael killed Claudia in self-defense, but Sonny convinces her not to in order to protect Michael
• Rebecca was hit by Nikolas's car; Ethan thinks it was intentional but Rebecca says it was an accident
• Johnny is upset that Olivia still has feelings for Sonny, but decides to stay with her anyway
• Dominic remembers arresting a tagger in NYC near a crime scene who used the same tag as one in Port Charles
• Elizabeth is worried about what Rebecca might tell her brother Steve about her
• Maxie wants Jason to put in a good word with Franco about a Crimson photo shoot
• Franco welcomes Jason to his studio, saying it took him long enough to pick up on his hints to meet
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 4 bullet points:

<summary>
• Maxie tells Spinelli to move to Portland with their baby, even though it pains her to be separated from her daughter
• Franco confesses to Dr. Kevin Collins that he killed his mother Heather Webber to protect Carly
• Lulu blames Dante for them losing custody of the baby, pushing him away despite Carly's advice to let him help her through the pain
• Dante suggests to Lulu that they should try to have another baby in order to start healing and pull together after their loss
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 7 bullet points:

<summary>
• Alexis is appointed to defend Manny Ruiz against her wishes, but he insists on keeping her as his attorney
• Doctors reveal Manny's violent behavior may have been caused by a brain anomaly that was fixed with surgery
• Carly is not allowed to leave Roselawn for Christmas, upsetting her and her children
• Michael asks Emily to spend Christmas with him, Morgan and Sonny since Carly can't be there
• Sonny refuses to allow Nikolas at his house for Christmas, straining his relationship with Courtney
• Nikolas gives Lulu a diamond necklace she always wanted as a child before leaving on a trip
• Alexis decides to mount a vigorous defense for Manny, believing he may not be guilty due to the brain anomaly
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 8 bullet points:

<summary>
* Gus discovers that Rafe is his son with Natalia, who kept it a secret from him for years
* Rafe is confused and upset after finding out Gus is his father
* Daisy and Rafe connect while in juvenile detention 
* Rick is determined to fight for custody of his unborn child with Beth against Alan
* Alan accuses Rick of being an unfit father and vows to keep the baby away from him
* Reva publicly confronts Alan for bouncing a check he wrote for her cancer research fundraiser
* Beth feels smothered by Alan's obsession with their unborn baby and plans a trip to visit a friend in Paris
* Harley reassures Daisy that she and Gus always get through tough times in their relationship
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 5 bullet points:

<summary>
• Rick initially cancels the annual Bauer 4th of July barbecue after his breakup with Beth, but Cassie and Josh decide to host it instead
• Ava reveals to Remy that she got pregnant using a fertility clinic, not with Bill's baby, but still marries Bill
• Bill confesses he still loves Lizzie and wants to continue seeing her even though he's now married to Ava
• Alan falls at the Spaulding 4th of July picnic but says he's fine, and decides they should go to the Bauer barbecue after all
• At the barbecue, Rick makes a short speech thanking everyone for coming, and Mallet gives a patriotic speech about the meaning of the holiday, as the town comes together to celebrate
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 6 bullet points:

<summary>
* Cassie and Jeffrey have a scheduling conflict between RJ's party and Jeffrey's awards dinner, which Edmund tries to take advantage of
* Dinah makes a deal with Edmund to tell Cassie that Edmund never kidnapped her, in exchange for sex
* Jonathan gets into a fight with Sandy over Tammy, and Reva breaks it up
* Reva asks Nate for her old job back at the bar, surprising him
* Sandy breaks things off with Tammy, unable to get past her doubts and focus on Jonathan
* Olivia and Bill take a family photo together, while Dinah declines to join them
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 5 bullet points:

<summary>
* Alan confesses to shooting his son Phillip in order to protect his family, but claims it was entrapment when confronted by the police and his family
* Dinah reveals to Edmund that she lost their baby, which was a girl, and proposes they conceive another child together, but Edmund leaves upset
* Tammy tries to reconcile with Sandy after their fight about her lingering feelings for Jonathan, but Sandy rebuffs her and has a drink with another woman, April
* Edmund visits Cassie, wanting to start over with her, but Cassie says too much has happened between them and they should focus on co-parenting their baby
* After Alan is arrested for Phillip's murder, Dinah shows up at Cassie's pretending to still be pregnant, and Edmund tells her to keep up the ruse when Cassie returns
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 10 bullet points:

<summary>
• Shayne is overwhelmed by his newfound baseball fame and just wants to spend time with Marina before leaving for training camp
• Gus confronts Eden on a rooftop, believing she is connected to the recent murders and pressuring her to confess or provide information
• Edmund asks Alexandra for advice on restoring Cassie's family farm as a surprise gift, but refuses to help Alexandra go after Jeffrey O'Neill
• Ben recalls that his attacker was wearing the same cologne as Mitch Hendon, making Mitch the prime suspect
• A reporter tries to get a scoop from Marina about her feelings on Ben, but she focuses on defending Ben's innocence
• Jeffrey is evicted from the Beacon by Cassie for his rude comments and enlists Gus's help in finding a new place to live
• Ross informs Mitch that Ben has identified him as the attacker and he needs to turn himself in to the police immediately
• Cassie goes to check on Jeffrey's room at the Beacon herself when moving out his belongings is taking too long
• Eden despairs that no one believes her innocence, but Tony offers to help her find the real killer
• Cassie discovers Mitch Hendon in a dire situation on the roof of the Beacon
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 2 bullet points:

<summary>
* Cyrus is working with an accomplice named Griggs to steal money from the donation checks at a Spaulding fundraiser by reading the account numbers over a radio, while pretending to help log the donations.
* Marina, who is working security at the event, figures out Cyrus's scheme to rob all the guests and confronts him, saying she can't let him go through with it.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 7 bullet points:

<summary>
* Lizzie is released from the hospital and Bill tells her he has a lead on the kidnapping case but needs to investigate it on his own.
* Alan invites Beth to go to China with him and the family for Christmas to save the Macau business deal, but Beth is hesitant.
* Remy confides in Shayne about losing his baby son Max and Ava leaving town, relating to Shayne's struggles.
* Josh finds out from Shayne's doctor that his current paralysis could be compounded by his previous accident and confronts Shayne about it.
* Reva meets with a doula to help ease her through her high-risk pregnancy while worrying about Shayne.
* Coop invites Beth to go away with him to a friend's timeshare after Christmas, but Beth says she can't because of family obligations.
* Shayne makes plans to leave town to avoid burdening Reva, despite Jeffrey's objections that Reva's cancer is the real issue, not her pregnancy.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 8 bullet points:

<summary>
• Roxy confronts Max about his plan with Asa to get a divorce, but Max says he doesn't want a divorce anymore.
• Blair returns home early from the cabin and tells Todd she wants to be with him. Todd admits he loves Blair and she forgives him.
• Keri has a sonogram showing the baby is okay. Antonio wants to tell Keri the truth about him being the father.
• Liz plans to take the baby and leave Llanview after it's born, upsetting R.J. and Antonio.
• Jen plans to confess to Cristian that she lied about him threatening to kill Mitch in hopes he'll forgive her.
• Rae outsmarts Asa, changing the divorce agreement so she gets 90% of his assets. She makes him decide between that or staying married.
• Al tells Gabrielle that Max wants to stay with Roxy, surprising her.
• Renee tries to get the signed divorce papers from Max to give to Asa, but Roxy has taken them.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 2 bullet points:

<summary>
• Jessica baptizes her baby Chloe with Natalie and Jared as the godparents, while Starr holds Chloe and remembers her own baby Hope who died. It's revealed that Natalie and Jared are keeping a secret from Jessica - that her real baby died and they switched it with Starr's baby to protect Jessica from the pain of losing her child.
• The police find the knife used to stab Blair, and while they initially suspect Zach Rosen, the fingerprint on the knife turns out to belong to John McBain, shocking Bo and Nora.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 3 bullet points:

<summary>
• Téa is defending Todd, who is accused of pushing a pregnant Marty down the stairs, because she wants him to connect with their daughter Danielle before Téa dies
• Danielle is conflicted about whether to trust Todd and let him be a father to her, given his violent past
• Rex gets a lead that the necklace left with him as a baby was made by a silversmith in Santa Fe, providing a clue to find his biological parents
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 6 bullet points:

<summary>
• Natalie and Paul are together but Natalie leaves abruptly after getting a call from John, who wants to see her
• Michael is worried someone is stalking him; he calls John who is questioning Dr. Long about illegal organ harvesting
• Marcie goes to find evidence against Dr. Long while he is being questioned by John
• Viki is in the hospital after having a heart attack while visiting Ben; her family is there to support her
• Nora gives John advice about moving on from Caitlin's death; she has a misunderstanding with Daniel Colson
• David confronts Paul, accusing him of trying to hurt Kelly, and the two get into a physical altercation
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 6 bullet points:

<summary>
• John plays a recording of a baby crying for Miles to listen to, suspecting Miles knows more about Todd's disappearance than he's letting on
• Marty is attacked by three men when her car runs out of gas, but she fights them off with mace
• Jessica tells Antonio their marriage is over because she is in love with Nash, devastating Antonio
• Antonio is furious at Cristian for not telling him sooner that Jessica had kissed Nash
• Viki and Clint discuss Jessica's dire health situation and vow to explore every option to find a liver donor for her
• Nash reassures Jessica that their love will get her through her illness, and that they are meant to be together
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 7 bullet points:

<summary>
• Dorian confronts Viki about having David stay with her, believing Viki is doing it to make her jealous
• David propositions Viki to sleep with him to get back at Dorian, but Viki declines
• Marty refuses to leave Miles and stay at a hotel with Cole, fearing Miles will turn her in for Spencer's murder
• Sarah reveals limited information about her boyfriend Hunter moving Todd, as the police question her
• Miles pays Hunter for his work but is left with Todd's body in his apartment as Hunter leaves
• Clint is upset with Dorian for letting her issues with Viki and David interfere with their evening plans
• Blair reluctantly agrees to return to Llanview while Rex and Cristian stay in Chicago to look for Todd
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 3 bullet points:

<summary>
* Viki confronts Marcie about her responsibility in the Killing Club murders, as Natalie has been kidnapped by the killer. Marcie regrets writing the book that inspired the murders.
* Bo comforts Nora as she awaits the results of an HIV test after learning her ex-husband Daniel may have exposed her to the virus. The initial test comes back negative.
* A woman named Tess tricks a valet and steals an expensive car belonging to a rude man who refused to buy her lunch at a restaurant.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 7 bullet points:

<summary>
• Tess and Nash discuss dreams and Tess wanting to stay in her new life, free from her old one
• Starr is upset that Blair read her instant messages and that kids at school avoid her due to her kidnapping
• Todd tries to set up a stock portfolio for Jessica through her financial advisor Rich
• Marcie and Rex are kidnapped by the Killing Club Killer, Hayes Barber, who sets a trap to hang them
• Dorian wants Viki to be her matron of honor if David has his brother Spencer be his best man
• Adriana is worried about Rex being kidnapped, and Dorian comforts her
• John and the police find Marcie and Rex and try to rescue them from the Killing Club Killer's trap
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 4 bullet points:

<summary>
• Kevin and Asa discuss how to deal with Willy Dawes, who they believe tampered with a chandelier that nearly killed Kelly. Asa wants to fight dirty but Kevin refuses.
• Antonio gets a chance to have his custody case for his daughter Jamie reconsidered in court. Keri and R.J. are adamant about keeping Antonio away from Jamie.
• Al develops a serious liver complication from his infection and may need a transplant to survive. Marcie dedicates a radio show to him as the Voice of the Night.
• Walker surprises Blair by playing piano and singing for her at Crossroads. Meanwhile, David claims to Kelly that he is in love with Dorian.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 7 bullet points:

<summary>
• Kelly and Rex get stuck together in a steam room and discuss relationship problems with Gigi and Adriana.
• Gigi confronts Adriana about interfering in her relationship with Rex, and the two women get into a physical altercation.
• Cristian and Layla argue over Layla leaving for a work trip to Milan instead of staying with Cristian in Paris.
• Cole says goodbye to Starr, Hope, Langston and Markko before being taken to prison for 10 years. He breaks up with Starr, wanting her to move on.
• John confronts Natalie about getting an amniocentesis without telling him. Natalie worries the baby might not be John's.
• Eddie Ford, the abusive father of James and Ford, shows up at their apartment after being released from jail. Inez tries to get the boys to leave with her.
• Markko prepares to return to UCLA, while Langston returns the key to his house that he once gave her. They say an emotional goodbye.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 8 bullet points:

<summary>
• Whitney is excited about pursuing a singing career with Chad's encouragement, despite her mother Eve's disapproval
• Rebecca and her friend Wally scheme to make Theresa think Rebecca is abusing Little Ethan in order to upset her
• Miguel, Pilar and Luis all lose their jobs, likely due to interference from the Cranes, putting the family in financial trouble
• Kay offers to get a job so Miguel can stay in college and watch their daughter Maria while she works
• T.C. believes Chad is the reason for Whitney's recent troubles and Eve agrees they can't let her get back into the music business
• Liz offers Whitney a singing job at her rebuilt club The Blue Note, which Whitney accepts to spite her mother
• Ethan, pressured by Rebecca, serves the Lopez-Fitzgeralds an eviction notice on their home, which is owned by the Cranes
• Rebecca gloats that this is payback against Theresa and the Lopez-Fitzgeralds
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 3 bullet points:

<summary>
• Sheridan was injured in a fire at her home, likely caused by arson, and is recovering in the hospital with Antonio and Luis by her side
• Liz is plotting to destroy Eve's marriage to T.C. and steal him away from her
• Theresa is giving away large sums of Crane money to charity, while Julian and Rebecca seem to have found a way to stop her and remove her from the Crane mansion
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 2 bullet points:

<summary>
* Gwen and Theresa get into a heated confrontation over baby Jane, with Gwen threatening to kill Theresa despite Katherine's attempts to defuse the situation.
* Luis insists on doing a DNA test on Marty to determine if he is really Beth's son or Sheridan's, while Beth strongly objects, making her look suspicious.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 3 bullet points:

<summary>
* Whitney is confused why her mother Eve changed her mind and is now supporting her moving to LA with Chad, which is causing conflict between Eve and TC.
* Luis refuses to believe Sheridan left on her own and went to Paris, so he is resuming the search for her, convinced something bad happened to her.
* Kay goes into premature labor and there are concerns for her and the baby's health as she is rushed to the hospital.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 5 bullet points:

<summary>
• Spike threatens Jessica and her family when they try to intervene and get Jessica away from Spike's abuse. Jessica ends up siding with Spike out of fear.
• Luis tries to convince Sheridan that she still loves him, but Sheridan insists she wants to be a loyal wife to Chris. Chris walks in on Luis holding Sheridan.
• Kay mysteriously finds herself transported to a romantic place alone with Miguel, possibly due to Endora's magic. Miguel tries to win Kay over.
• Gwen acts suspiciously, trying to prevent Ethan and Theresa from investigating strange noises coming from outside. Theresa discovers Rebecca and J.T. Cornell on the ledge.
• Noah physically attacks Spike for the way he has been abusing Jessica. Spike demands that Noah be arrested for assault and battery.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 7 bullet points:

<summary>
• Kay tells Miguel she loves him and can't wait to marry him and raise their daughter Maria together
• Rebecca gets in bed with a sleeping Ethan, pretending to be Gwen, in order to keep him from realizing Gwen is gone
• Gwen and Theresa both meet with J.T. to pay him off, each hoping to get him to either expose the truth about Ethan's paternity or leave town
• Luis, Sheridan, Paloma and Chris search for Fancy in some caves, and find her trapped in a deep hole
• Fox pretends to be on the phone with a doctor and fakes that he is dying in order to manipulate Kay into staying with him
• J.T. reveals that Theresa paid him more money than Gwen did
• While trying to rescue Fancy from the hole, she slips and falls, and Luis dives in after her
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 5 bullet points:

<summary>
* Karen and Kevin argue about Kevin's drug addiction and his desire to get more drugs from Frank; Karen refuses to help him get more drugs but offers to help him get treatment
* Joshua reveals to Alison that he was childhood friends with her father Malcolm but they grew apart; Alison accuses Joshua of killing her father but he denies it
* Rafe confronts the newly turned vampire Jamal, demanding to know where Joshua has taken Alison; they get into a fight and Rafe knocks out Jamal
* Lucy loses confidence in her abilities to help find Alison now that she's no longer a slayer, but Elizabeth encourages her to use her natural intuition; Lucy collapses while trying to use her tarot cards to locate Alison
* Ian's hunger for blood is getting worse; he moves out to protect Lucy and gets more blood packets from Chris to avoid feeding on humans
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 10 bullet points:

<summary>
* Sharon asks Victor for help proving Adam's innocence, but Victor refuses, warning her that Adam is dangerous
* Daniel is found unconscious and hypothermic after apparently confronting Daisy, who knocked him out and left him
* Doctors are working to slowly raise Daniel's body temperature and assess his head injury; his condition is critical
* Daisy has escaped with her baby and was last seen on an ATM camera just over the Canadian border
* Phyllis blames herself for not keeping Daisy in prison and worries she could lose Daniel
* Cane is struggling to cover for his friend Blake who did a poor job on a rushed work assignment
* Neil and Sofia are upset with the subpar work Blake submitted and tell Cane to fire him
* Colin, Cane's father, meets Lily and is eager to see his grandchildren, but Lily makes an excuse
* Nick threatens to file for full custody of Faith, fed up with Sharon's actions and ridiculous alibi
* Leslie warns Adam that the DA is moving forward with the murder charges and trial despite lack of evidence
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 10 bullet points:

<summary>
* Victor and Michael discuss the forensic accounting report showing no wrongdoing by Victor, which they hope will make Abby and Victoria see reason in the lawsuit.
* In court, Vance argues that Victor selling a company in Dubai shows he intends to devalue Newman Enterprises to undermine the lawsuit. The judge agrees to freeze some of Victor's assets.
* Jack finds evidence in Hawaii that Skye was living there, including her rare perfume in the ashes of a burned down shack. However, the police are unimpressed without a body or witnesses.
* Nina confronts Ronan about his illness and insists on donating part of her liver to him, even if he tries to push her away. Ronan tracked down his father who died of the same disease.
* Heather steals a recording of Chance's shooting to analyze. Paul notices the gunshot sounds like a blank, making them suspicious about Ronan's involvement.
* Sharon tells the DA about Jack's findings in Hawaii regarding Skye, but he dismisses it as not enough proof and threatens obstruction charges against Sharon.
* Adam worries Victor has paid off everyone in Hawaii and the new DA to hide evidence of Skye being alive. He feels it may be hopeless to prove Skye was there.
* Abby is torn about the lawsuit and worries about Daniel's condition after his injury. Phyllis says Daniel is awake but out of it.
* Spencer seems to be hiding a secret witness for the case against the corrupt former DA. Heather and Paul are determined to find out who it is.
* The judge rules in Abby and Victoria's favor to freeze some of Victor's assets. Victor warns them they are destroying the company and their own trusts in the process.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 2 bullet points:

<summary>
• Lily gets stuck in an elevator with Tyler, who has claustrophobia, and she helps calm him down by telling stories and jokes until they are freed.
• Jamie accuses Fen of pushing him off the roof and trying to kill him, saying he plans to press charges against Fen, while Lauren insists Jamie is lying.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 9 bullet points:

<summary>
• Victor confronts Nick about arranging for Newman Enterprises to buy Jabot's debt in order to foreclose on the company
• Jack calls an emergency Jabot shareholders meeting to reveal Victor and Nick's plan and propose selling 51% of Jabot to Chancellor Industries to prevent a Newman takeover
• Malcolm worries how Drucilla will react if paternity test results show he is Lily's father
• Drucilla pleads with Phyllis not to reveal the secret about Lily's paternity
• Lily tells Devon the family wants him there even though they forgot his birthday amidst Neil's health crisis
• J.T. expresses concern to Mac about her spending time with the unstable Kevin Fisher
• Victor meets with the bankers and offers to personally buy Jabot's debt, convincing them to back out of the deal with Nick
• Nick accuses Victor of humiliating him and gives control of Newman Enterprises back to Victor
• Jack puts his Chancellor Industries proposal to a vote of the Jabot shareholders
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 4 bullet points:

<summary>
• Jack and Sharon move out of the Abbott mansion, leaving it to Gloria and Jeffrey; Jack is heartbroken to leave his family home
• Jill and Katherine coach an actor named Alistair to impersonate John Abbott in order to find out Gloria's secret for marrying Jeffrey
• Adam and Victoria clash at work over a spokesperson for Beauty of Nature; Adam apologizes for his behavior and Victoria becomes suspicious when Victor goes to LA without telling her
• Victor visits an art museum in LA with Sabrina, who encourages him to make an impact by building a museum in Genoa City as his legacy
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 8 bullet points:

<summary>
• Adam's body was identified at the Athletic Club and his death is being investigated as a homicide
• The police searched the Newman ranch and questioned family members as suspects
• Patty told Jack she is pregnant with his baby, but he seemed hesitant about the news at first
• Lauren tried to convince Ryder to let her and Jana go, suspecting Sheila is behind the kidnapping
• The police found Jack's monogrammed handkerchief jammed in Adam's throat, making Jack a person of interest
• Phyllis and Sharon schemed to get rid of Nick's jacket that had a bloodstain on it before the police could find it
• The police found Victor's broken, bloody watch and questioned him about it; Victor admitted the blood was Adam's
• Lauren confronted who she thought was Sheila, but it turned out to be Sarah
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 4 bullet points:

<summary>
• Genevieve is rushing to meet Jack in Las Vegas to get married, while Nikki tries to stop Jack from making a mistake by marrying Genevieve
• Victor confronts Chelsea about her scheme with Billy in Myanmar that he orchestrated, and wants to pay her off to leave town
• Devon hears Angelina's new song that Tucker produced and loves it, bringing them closer as a family
• Victoria is protective of her new baby and doesn't want Adam anywhere near him, even though Adam helped deliver the baby when Chelsea went into labor
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 7 bullet points:

<summary>
* Victor is concerned about an SEC investigation into his purchase of Beauty of Nature from Genevieve and asks Michael to help prevent him from losing the company.
* Devon celebrates the success of his new song with family and friends at a restaurant. Neil leaves abruptly after a tense phone call with Harmony.
* Phyllis blames her sister Avery for helping Daisy gain custody of Lucy. Nick reveals he asked Victor for help with the custody case.
* Lauren pulls a gun on Daisy at her store after Daisy threatens Fen. Lauren is arrested for assault with a deadly weapon.
* Genevieve asks Tucker to claim he loaned her the money to purchase Beauty of Nature, in exchange for a percentage of the profits, to satisfy the SEC. He agrees.
* Harmony and Katherine discuss the tension between Harmony and Neil. Neil shows up wanting to talk to Harmony.
* Michael rushes to the police station with Avery after learning of Lauren's arrest. Victor wonders why Michael hasn't returned his calls about the SEC issue.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 5 bullet points:

<summary>
• Jack and Sharon discuss their past relationships with Nick and Phyllis on Nick and Phyllis' anniversary
• Victor approves an acquisition proposed by Adam despite Victoria's objections, causing tension between them
• Lily returns to work soon after losing her baby, concerning Neil and Cane who think she needs more time to grieve
• Gloria discovers Jeffrey has moved in with Jill at the Chancellor mansion
• Phyllis goes on a treasure hunt arranged by Nick for their anniversary, finding meaningful gifts and notes
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 9 bullet points:

<summary>
• Genevieve is grateful to Ethan for something he did for her.
• Ricky asks Paul for help, saying he needs to work on his resentment issues. Paul agrees to try to find a therapist for Ricky.
• Phyllis tells Avery that she and Nick are getting married and expecting a baby. Avery has to leave for an emergency.
• Daniel proposes to Daisy, but she is skeptical of his intentions at first. He convinces her he wants a real marriage.
• Lauren faces felony assault charges for pulling a gun on Daisy. Michael and Avery work out a plea deal with the D.A. to keep Lauren out of prison.
• Jill and Genevieve get into a physical altercation at the Athletic Club, with Jill throwing a drink on Genevieve. Billy and Cane break it up.
• Genevieve receives a call from Colin saying he has been released from prison thanks to her help.
• Paul asks Avery for her honest opinion on Ricky's character. Avery says she thinks Ricky is amoral.
• Daniel tells Phyllis that he and Daisy are getting married.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 2 bullet points:

<summary>
* Cassie is in the hospital recovering from a car accident involving Daniel, who was drunk at a party; Cassie starts remembering that she was actually the one driving the car when it crashed
* Gloria asks her sons Michael and Kevin to help improve her relationship with her husband John; Michael plans a special evening out with Lauren to make up for not communicating with her for several days
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 6 bullet points:

<summary>
• Sharon and Nick discuss the anniversary of Cassie's death and how it has affected them. Sharon is struggling with her emotions and medication.
• Summer has a party at Phyllis' penthouse with alcohol. Kyle intervenes when Fen gets too aggressive with Summer. Nick and Phyllis argue about how to handle the situation.
• Abby confronts Carmine about his affair with Lauren and warns him to end it. Paul also threatens Carmine to stay away from Lauren.
• Lauren and Michael's marriage is strained due to Lauren's affair. Fen worries they may get divorced.
• Kyle admits to Jack that he has feelings for Summer, despite Nick's disapproval. Summer is excited that Kyle defended her to Nick.
• Nick secretly orders a paternity test kit, hinting that he may doubt Summer's paternity.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 7 bullet points:

<summary>
• Lauren and Michael discuss Chloe skipping her therapy appointment, violating her probation. Kevin asks Michael not to report it yet so he can find Chloe and convince her to go to Fairview.
• Ian Ward approaches Nikki, saying the extortion charges against him were dismissed. Victor confronts Ian and warns him to stay away from Nikki.
• Avery leaves in the middle of filming her cooking show to go talk to Dylan after he gets upset about a harassing online comment.
• Chloe is at the movie theater where she and Kevin were the night Delia died. Kevin finds her there and convinces her she needs professional help at Fairview.
• Summer opens up to Austin, Avery's cameraman, about her mom being in a coma. Austin reveals he also lost his mother unexpectedly.
• Dylan asks a woman named Willa for any information that can be used to put Ian away, willing to pay for it.
• Victor has Ian abducted and threatens him, saying Ian won't win this fight.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 3 bullet points:

<summary>
• In a dream or vision, Nick talks to his deceased daughter Cassie about his regrets and how he believes her death led to the unraveling of his family and relationships.
• Cassie shows Nick an alternate reality of what life could have been like if she had not died that night, with the Winters and Newman families being happy and united.
• After this experience, Nick realizes he needs to stop dwelling on "what ifs", promises Cassie he will try to move forward, and decides to return home to Sharon and Noah.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 8 bullet points:

<summary>
• Lauren is upset that she can't testify at Daisy's parental rights hearing for Lucy, while Phyllis is supporting Daisy in order to gain custody of the child herself.
• At the hearing, Daisy claims she has changed and wants a second chance to be a mother to Lucy, while Rafe questions her motives and worthiness.
• Jack is waiting to make a big investment related to the Newman Enterprises IPO, and meets a mysterious woman named Genevieve at Gloworm.
• Victor argues with a pregnant Diane, who claims the baby is his. She starts having severe cramps and Victor calls an ambulance to take her to the hospital.
• Adam has footage of the ambulance at the Newman ranch and tips off the media, hoping to sabotage the IPO.
• News breaks that Victor has apparently suffered a stroke, causing Michael to worry when he can't reach him.
• At the hearing, Daniel pleads with the judge not to let Daisy have Lucy, saying she is unfit to be a mother.
• As Newman stock soars, Jack tells Genevieve he believes it will soon plummet and prepares to make his move.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 2 bullet points:

<summary>
* Kevin reveals to Michael that Chloe is alive and he has been living with her for the past two years, but she disappeared after learning Adam was alive. Kevin kidnapped Phyllis to trade for Chloe, but Phyllis escaped. Adam is holding Chloe captive and wants Kevin to stay in town to help him in exchange for Chloe's freedom.
* Devon apologizes to Elena for paying off her student loans without consulting her. They agree to communicate better in the future. Meanwhile, Nick asks Michael to represent him in the custody battle against Adam over Christian. Nick also calls Chelsea to warn her that Adam may go after custody of Connor next.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 7 bullet points:

<summary>
• Kevin tells Michael and Esther he is moving to Portland with Bella for a fresh start, despite their objections.
• Sharon turns down Chelsea's offer to return to work at Chelsea 2.0 due to her other commitments.
• Nikki returns from a spa getaway in Colorado, feeling refreshed and ready for her charity concert, despite having an MS flare-up.
• Nick is worried about Nikki performing and wants her to cancel the concert, but Nikki is determined to do it for herself and the cause.
• Scott and Sharon discuss their childhoods growing up without fathers and the challenges the Newman family is facing.
• Victor hopes Nikki's concert will help bring the Newman family back together and gifts her a special dress for the performance.
• Kevin and Bella leave town, with Bella innocently revealing they are going to see her mother Chloe.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 3 bullet points:

<summary>
* Colleen is worried about her dad Brad's mysterious past in Cleveland and the threatening notes she has been receiving, while JT and Paul investigate Brad's background there
* Nick reveals to Phyllis and Sharon that he is the father of Phyllis' baby, but Phyllis says she will raise the child on her own
* A woman identifies Brad Carlton as George Kaplan from an old photo - the man who murdered his own family years ago before supposedly dying in a hit-and-run accident
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 5 bullet points:

<summary>
* Phyllis is fired from Restless Style by Billy, who plans to feature her arrest story in the magazine and TV show, despite her pleas not to crucify her in the media.
* Victoria considers job offers from Jack at Beauty of Nature, Ashley at Jabot, and Victor at Newman Enterprises, but is unsure what path to take.
* Adam surprises Chelsea by revealing he bought them a lavish home with many amenities, leaving her in awe.
* Jack meets with Jabot board members to sway their opinions and maintain his position, going against Ashley's wishes to have him removed due to a conflict of interest.
* Nick punches Billy for his treatment of Phyllis, while Avery advises Phyllis not to defend herself publicly or it could damage her case.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 8 bullet points:

<summary>
• Hilary and Devon get married in the hospital as Hilary's health declines after a car accident
• Their family and friends gather for the wedding, including Neil, Lily, Cane, Mariah, Tessa, Phyllis, and Jack
• Hilary asks Mariah to take over their TV show, sensing she may not recover
• During the ceremony, Hilary passes out, causing concern, but she regains consciousness
• Neil reads a passage about love at Hilary's request
• In their vows, Devon and Hilary express their deep love for each other that was inevitable from the start, despite challenges
• They exchange rings, with Devon giving Hilary the same eternity band from years ago
• Hilary and Devon are pronounced husband and wife to the applause of their loved ones
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 3 bullet points:

<summary>
* John Abbott suffers a minor stroke while in prison and is taken to the hospital, where his family gathers to see him. Though he seems to be doing well at first, his condition suddenly worsens.
* Lily returns home after leaving Daniel, but tensions between her parents Neil and Dru drive her to leave again. She confides in Daniel about her family problems.
* Neil and Dru argue about Lily and the secrets Dru kept in the past. Fed up, Neil says he is done and implies he wants to make serious changes regarding their relationship.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 6 bullet points:

<summary>
• Jack and Sharon argue over whether to publish an exposé on Victor Newman after his death
• Cane and Chloe get married and Jill insists on throwing them a wedding reception
• Adam fires Victoria and Neil from Newman Enterprises and hires Brad as the new CEO
• Paul prepares to go to Mexico to search for a missing Nikki while Nick and Victoria worry about her
• Jill confronts Jack over an article exposing issues at Jabot and threatens legal action
• Nikki refuses to leave Mexico, believing Victor may still be alive, and hides out at a bar
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 10 bullet points:

<summary>
* Murphy reads a letter from Katherine asking everyone to write down their thoughts and feelings in letters to her, which are then burned so the smoke can deliver their words to her in the afterlife.
* The attendees, including Jill, Victor, Nikki, Paul, Lauren, Michael, and others write their letters expressing their hopes, dreams, troubles and current situations.
* Neil reveals he has lost his sight after an electrical accident but wants to be treated normally.
* Billy helps Victoria sneak out of the hospital to attend their son Johnny's preschool orientation.
* Victor arranges for a doctor to try to bring Phyllis out of her coma.
* The attendees dance and celebrate Katherine's life at the remembrance gathering.
* Nikki appears shaky and emotional, concerning Victor and Paul.
* Jill realizes Katherine's true message was that life is about the journey, not the destination, and that Jill's journey led her to happiness with Colin.
* Jill returns the music box, no longer needing it, and hopes Katherine is enjoying her own journey in the afterlife.
* The story ends with the doctor attempting to revive Phyllis from her coma, with many anxious to hear what she has to say.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 2 bullet points:

<summary>
* Billy and Amber flirt and hook up at a bar in New York after Daniel's art show, while Colleen and Daniel grow closer and make love
* Michael agrees to take in River's daughter Eden while River faces serious charges related to a bombing from his radical activist past
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 4 bullet points:

<summary>
• Jack resigns from the Abbott-Winters Foundation after a heated argument with Billy about Phyllis and their affair. Jack says he no longer believes in the foundation's mission of redemption and second chances.
• Phyllis tries to convince Jack to forgive her and not give up on their marriage, but Jack angrily tells her to leave the house and that their relationship is over. 
• When Phyllis refuses to leave, Jack tries to pack a bag for her. As Phyllis tries to stop him, she falls and hits her head, leaving her unconscious.
• Billy arrives and finds Phyllis injured. The police are called to the Abbott house about an unconscious woman.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 8 bullet points:

<summary>
• Doctors and nurses are attempting to resuscitate Damon, who appears to be dying from a violent incident
• Damon sees a vision of his deceased son Elias, who tells him it's not his time to die yet and he has much to live for
• Ashley confesses her feelings for Victor, leading to the end of her marriage with Brad
• Lily confides in Kevin about her trauma from nearly being assaulted by Alex, and Kevin comforts her
• Jack agrees to see if he can get Sharon a job at Jabot, with Nick secretly offering to pay her salary
• Michael prepares to fight Kevin, who is angry about Michael's relationship with Lauren
• Victor asks Nikki to go easy on Ashley, despite Nikki's anger over Ashley's actions
• The doctors are able to revive Damon and rush him to surgery
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 5 bullet points:

<summary>
• Chance receives a medal of valor at a ceremony attended by his family and girlfriend Chloe
• Mac and Billy argue over her surrogacy plans and his infidelity, leading to a breakup
• Daniel, Kevin, Jana, Amber and Phyllis discuss Daniel's murder case and the upcoming grand jury testimony of Deacon and Ryder
• Michael warns Phyllis and Amber not to encourage Daniel to flee the country if he is arrested again
• Chloe goes to retrieve her purse at Restless Style, where she encounters a distraught Billy after his breakup with Mac, but she rebuffs his advances
</summary>

Here is an 8-point summary of the text:

<summary>
• Billy and Victoria discuss the possibility that Victoria may be pregnant again, but a test reveals she is not.
• Chloe and Kevin take humorous Christmas photos with Delia at a tree lot, where Jana secretly reports them to child protective services.
• Cane meets with his Australian friend Blake, who is secretly investigating Cane's background for Tucker.
• Phyllis publishes an article harshly criticizing Sharon for supporting Adam, despite Billy's reservations about the backlash it may cause.
• Daniel visits Daisy, who is staying with Phyllis due to her high-risk pregnancy, and they argue about the baby.
• Kevin offers to raise Daisy's baby, causing tension with Phyllis who doubts his parental fitness given his history.
• Lily and Cane enjoy Christmas preparations with their twins, while Cane privately worries about the secret investigation into his background.
• Daniel brings Summer to visit Phyllis, insisting Daisy should leave if Summer is to stay there, but Phyllis says Daisy must remain due to her condition.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 4 bullet points:

<summary>
• On Christmas Eve, Devon and Hilary reconcile and she agrees to return to hosting GC Buzz with full creative control
• Jack refuses to allow Billy to stay for Christmas dinner with Ashley and Traci, causing Billy to leave
• At Michael and Lauren's party, Phyllis reveals she plans to leave Jabot and work for Lauren full-time, while Gloria and Chloe clash over Kevin and Bella
• At Devon and Hilary's party, Lily informs Devon that Hilary manipulated him by pretending to have other job offers in order to get what she wanted at GC Buzz
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 7 bullet points:

<summary>
• Faith ran away but was found safe at Dylan's coffeehouse. Nick and Sharon argued about the custody battle over Faith.
• Ashley and Stitch had an awkward encounter at the lab after sleeping together. Abby sensed something was off between them.
• Billy was upset that Victoria wants their daughter Katie to have the last name Newman. Ashley thinks Billy is upset because it means his relationship with Victoria is truly over.
• Constance told Adam that his father committed suicide after Victor Newman took over his company in a hostile takeover. Adam vowed to make Victor pay.
• Avery's application to have the warehouse district designated as a historical landmark was denied, a setback in her and Dylan's efforts to stop the redevelopment project.
• Jill and Colin argued about the warehouse project, with Colin wanting to invest in it while Jill opposes it. Jill also expressed anger at Victor for taking over Chancellor Industries.
• It's revealed that Victor is working with Joe behind the scenes to ensure the warehouse development project goes through.
</summary>

Here is a summary of the text in 6 bullet points:

<summary>
• Cane brought his baby Sam home from the hospital and had a welcome home party
• Jill sold Chancellor Industries to Jack and Jabot, despite the no-confidence vote against Jack by the Jabot board
• Ashley and the Jabot board passed an amendment requiring the CEO to work from the Jabot office, forcing Jack to choose between being CEO and caring for his mother Dina
• Nick wanted to build a dream home for Chelsea and their family, but Chelsea preferred to stay in their current penthouse
• Mattie called the police on Reed for drinking and driving after a party; Reed said he would never forgive her
• The police called Victoria to inform her that Reed had been arrested
</summary>
